channel.title: Champion Profile on Openscapes
channel.description: Recent content in Champion Profile on Openscapes

item.title: Personifying code
item.description: Anything and everything we do to increase visibility of open practices and data science within environmental science communities is important. When we see things, it is easier to value them. Openscapes Champion Allison Horst is doing this in part through her personifyr art series. She uses in the classroom at the University of California at Santa Barbara, where she is a lecturer of data science and statistics in an environmentally-focused graduate program.
